abstract: A dictionary that defines basic payment and contact information that the Apple Pay payment request object uses for the W3C Payment Request API.

items.description: The merchant’s two-letter ISO-3166 country code.
items.name: countryCode

items.description: An array of the payment capabilities that the merchant supports, such as credit or debit card payments.
items.name: merchantCapabilities

items.description: The payment networks the merchant provides to their customers.
items.name: supportedNetworks

items.description: A list of two-letter country codes for limiting payment to credit cards from specific countries or regions.
items.name: supportedCountries

items.description: The initial coupon code for the payment request.
items.name: couponCode

items.description: A Boolean value that determines whether the payment sheet displays the coupon code field.
items.name: supportsCouponCode

items.description: A list of fields use for processing the transaction, including the name, address, and other information associated with the payment method.
items.name: requiredBillingContactFields

items.description: A list of fields used for processing the transaction, including the recipient’s name, mailing address, and other contact details.
items.name: requiredShippingContactFields

items.description: The customer’s address, used for sending products or services for to the person.
items.name: shippingContact

items.description: A value that indicates whether the shipping mode prevents the user from editing the shipping address.
items.name: shippingContactEditingMode

items.description: Application-specific data or state you can add to support your app.
items.name: applicationData

items.description: Values you use to enable or disable Apple Pay Later for a specific transaction.
items.name: ApplePayLaterAvailability

items.description: A value that indicates whether Apple Pay Later is available for a transaction.
items.name: applePayLaterAvailability

items.description: Support payments using Apple Pay on your website.
items.name: Setting up the payment request API to accept Apple Pay

items.description: A dictionary that defines the Apple Pay payment request object to use for the W3C Payment Request API.
items.name: ApplePayRequest

items.description: A dictionary that defines the Apple Pay modifiers for a payment type in the W3C Payment Request API.
items.name: ApplePayModifier

title: ApplePayRequestBase
